text: Richard Hayman (27 March 1920 - 5 February 2014) was an American arranger, harmonica player and conductor. He served as an arranger for the Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM) movies Girl Crazy (1930), Thousands Cheer (1943), and Meet Me in St. Louis (1944). He was born in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Hayman died at a hospice in New York. He was 93 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * *[ Richard Hayman] at AllMusic Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American composers Category:American conductors Category:Musicians from Massachusetts Category:People from Cambridge, Massachusetts
title: Richard Hayman
